sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Form, Row, Button, Col, Image, Card, ListGroup, } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Message from "../components/Message"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); //calculate Price cart.itemsPrice=cart.cartItems.reduce((acc,currItem)=>acc+currItem.qty*currItem.price,0); const placeOrderHandler=(e)=>{ console.log('place order !!') } return (

Shipping

Address {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city} , {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} , {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( "Your Cart Is Empty" ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X {item.price}₹ ={" "} {item.qty * item.price}₹; ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items {cart.itemsPrice} Shipping {cart.shipping} GST {cart.gst} Total {cart.total}
); }; export default PlaceOrderScreen;
